description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development (Covid), Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid), Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources for effective advocacy and partnerships on child rights issues with stakeholders.

description.narrative: Mongolia CO has worked to remain relevant and create opportunities for engagement and advocacy by creating compelling content and delivering it on multiple channels to reach wider audience. The CO communicated and advocated with decision makers, supporters, partners and the wider public in coordination with Programme on annual priority areas including air pollution, nutrition, WASH. The CO integrated and took action on selected UNICEF's global communications priorities and campaigns disseminating these elements in a locally-appropriate way. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/01/2020
